Address.label: Address
Address.value: B900, BABRAHAM RESEARCH CAMPUS BLOCKS A AND B, PORTWAY BUILDING, CAMBRIDGE, CB22 3AT, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bicycle Therapeutics PLC is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company developing a novel class of medicines which are referred to as Bicycles. The Bicycles are synthetic short peptides constrained to form two loops which stabilize their structural geometry. Its initial internal programs are focused on oncology indications with high unmet medical need.
